description:
Riku Rei undergoes a certain ritual and joins Temujin’s group. Meanwhile, Suigin encounters a young boy named Takeshi. Apparently he is travelling to get money to help his ailing friend, Mikan, who’s like his older sister. He ends up crashing a martial arts tournament and accidentally drags Suigin and Twin Star with him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 水銀, タケシと出会う!
